title: A strange encounter of two lovers or, The dying maid reviv'd. To the tune of, On the bank of a brook, &c. With allowance.
publisher: Printed for F. Coles, T. Vere, J. Wright, and J. Clarke,
notes: Date and place of publication from Wing CD-ROM, 1996.
Verse - "Down in a cypress grove as I was lying,".
Wing CD-ROM, 1996 gives range of dates: 1674-1679.
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
